00015 InvalidRecordException::InvalidRecordException(
00016     const RecordId& rec_id, const PageId page_num)
00017     : BadgerDbException(""),
00018       record_id_(rec_id),
00019       page_number_(page_num) {

00021   ss << "Request made for an invalid record."
00022      << " Record {page=" << record_id_.page_number
00023      << ", slot=" << record_id_.slot_number
00024      << "} from page " << page_number_;
